title: Initiation of dendritic failure of LLZTO via sub-surface lithium deposition
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2431-2440
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03916A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marco Siniscalchi, Yifu Shi, Guanchen Li, Joshua S. Gibson, Robert S. Weatherup, Ruy S. Bonilla, Susannah C. Speller, Chris R. M. Grovenor
Mg is used as the tracer element in the Li plating electrode to confirm that pure Li metal can plate in isolated pores near the solid electrolyte surface. This results in an internal pressure buildup and in the spallation of the LLZTO solid electrolyte, initiating the dendritic process.
